text:
lU Gregozy Hall
Urbana, Illinois
March 26, 19%
Mr. Kenneth D. Wright
Director of Broadcasting
Station WUOT (FM)
University of Tennessee
Knoxville, Tennessee
Dear Kent
Now that you* re going to spend a year at the Center, I
assume that 1*11 have to be looking for someone else to take
your place on the NAEB committee. Not that I don’t want your
noble services, but I imagine that both you and the Center
people would feel that you shouldn’t be serving both during
your year there. There’s no hurry but I want to raise the
question so that if you haven’t discussed this with yourself
or wi th President Newburn you might want to do so sometime.
Kind personal regards.
Sincerely yours.
FEStcu
Frank E. Schooley
President
